.class nested public auto ansi sealed NormalizerStaticExtensions/OnFitAffine`1<TData> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NormalizerStaticExtensions.OnFitAffine(Of TData)(scale As TData, offset As TData)

Docs.typeparam: The data type being received, either a numeric type, or a sequence of the numeric type
Docs.param: The scales. In the scalar case, this is a single value. In the vector case this is of length equal to the number of slots.
The offsets. In the scalar case, this is a single value. In the vector case this is of length equal to the number of slots, or of length zero if all the offsets are zero.
Docs.summary: For user provided delegates to receive information when an affine normalizer is fitted. The function of the normalizer transformer is (input - offset) * scale.
